price: Biz Musa’ya; “Kullarımı geceleyin yola çıkar. Muhakkak ki takip edileceksiniz.” diye vahyettik.
arabic: ۞ وَأَوۡحَيۡنَآ إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰٓ أَنۡ أَسۡرِ بِعِبَادِيٓ إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ

version.title: Turkish translation - Rowwad Tanslation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Turkish by Rowwad Translation Center in cooperation with Islamhouse.com in 1440 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-awḥaynā ilā mūsā an asri biʿibādī innakum muttabaʿūna
